Refining Genome Annotations with Apollo

## Associated Tutorial

This workflows is part of the tutorial [Refining Genome Annotations with Apollo (prokaryotes)](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/genome-annotation/tutorials/apollo/tutorial.html), available in the [GTN](https://training.galaxyproject.org)
